mean_en: one of a group of senior managers who run a company; a person who is in charge of a particular activity or department in a company, a college, etc.; a person in charge of a film/movie or play who tells the actors and staff what to do
sentence: "Cut!" the director shouted while shooting a film.
sentence_trans: ”停！“导演在拍摄电影的时候大叫道。
word_etyma: di使……变成 + rect表示直 + or表示人 → director指导者，导演
